actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to compelling acts on the basis of race, creed, color, or national origin.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no citizen shall be compelled against his will to do or perform any act required on the basis of race, creed, color, or national origin.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to compelling acts on the basis of race, creed, color, or national origin.
